  • Uses of Brick in project.chenlin_17.Views

    Subclasses of Brick in project.chenlin_17.Views
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    (package private) class 
    CementBrick
    This cement brick class is the concrete class extends from the brick class.
    It contains crack property.
    (package private) class 
    ClayBrick
    This clay brick class is the concrete class extends from the brick class.
    Note: Its class name is clay brick, which makes its previous name "Brick2" readable.
    It contains changes from the awt to javafx.
    It contains changes of class variables according to Bob's code convention.
    (package private) class 
    SteelBrick
    This steel brick class is the concrete class extends from the brick class.
    Steel brick type would break according to a generated random value.

    Methods in project.chenlin_17.Views that return Brick
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private Brick
    AdvancedBuilder.getBrick(Character brickType, javafx.scene.Group brickGroup)
    This function builds the brick view according to the position and type read from the world file.
    It contains three basic types: Cement, Steel and Clay.
    It contains two different size: half and full.
    Brick
    GeneralBuilder.makeBrick(javafx.geometry.Point2D point, javafx.geometry.Dimension2D size, int type, javafx.scene.Group group)
    This function makes the brick view for the wall.
    If it is the first option, the geometry brick is built.
    Else the image brick is built.
